sentences.sContent: They have a stomach ache, or diarrhea, or their grilled cheese sandwiches "tasted funny" or "didn't look right.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have a stomach ache, or diarrhea, or their grilled cheese sandwiches "tasted funny" or "didn't look right.
sentences.sCn: 他们胃痛，或腹泻，或者说他们的烤芝士三明治味道很奇怪或看上起不对劲。

trans.tranOther: If you have a stomach ache, you have a pain in your stomach
